attributes.review:
I downloaded this app and it asked for my location. I don't know why they would want that but after looking up articles in Facebook I came to the conclusion that this app is monitored by russian spies to infiltrate the United States. I am scared for my life. Please, Trump if you are so kind, take this app down. We do not want to be invaded by the communists. This is a threat to our society.  

Sincerely, a pro-choice, democrat, decent human being
attributes.title: Please Trump Take This Down

attributes.review:
I would give it 0 stars if I could. The app is glitchy and I was offended by the layout! The red, white, and blue colors were painful for my eyes. It’s as if this man does not respect the nation’s beautiful flag >:(

I’d also like to add that when I opened this app, my cat threw up on the floor. Clearly this app is sickening to humans and animals alike! I expect Donald Trump to pay for the pain this app has caused me and I will be redirecting his payment to Joe Biden’s campaign.
attributes.title: Do NOT Download!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this wonderfully horrible app to see what the hype was about with that cheese ball y’all call “President”. All i found were tons of articles and facts about some ra*ist, ugly meatball. I can’t believe people still use this app even after the emails came to light. this app crashes a lot because i think it’s takes a lot to keep up w fake news ): gross place to be id say.
attributes.title: Worse than kidney stones

attributes.review: I am a huge fan of the Lord and savior himself, Donald J. Trump. I love how his oily Cheeto skin glows in the sunlight. I was so disappointed in this app. I had great expectations for it. It kept on crashing and these weird and inappropriate ads kept on popping up. I never thought of our president to be a man who would let such ads to pop up. And to add to that the app always says insulting things abt me. I was hurt by this bc I am one of his biggest fan.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review:
Thought I could show some real support for a non-fascist person who uses their position to echo his party’s weaponization of Christianity, denial and trivialization of racial and economic disparity/injustice, classify ideologies as action groups, spreading xenophobia, and other fascist tendencies. I guess I was mistaken. Sadly, the other main candidate shares some of these characteristics as well. 

Anyways, I don’t need these people having my phone number 💁‍♀️
1 star
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: this app completely destroyed my phone like there were so many viruses and i had to end up buying a new phone! i just wanted to be informed on what our president was doing to help our country. and bam! VIRUS. the worst part is.. before it completely destroyed everything all that was on the app were very harsh racist remarks. 10/10 do NOT recommend using this app! if i could rate it - stars TRUST ME I WOULD

this app broke my heart and shattered it into a million pieces. i will never forgive the app store for letting me put this on my phone. my phone was perfectly fine and when i downloaded this is got RAN OVER BY A CAR😡 this app brings bad karma and luck to anyone who downloads it. i am crying and typing this on my phone that has been squished and shattered and the glass is cutting my little fingies😔
attributes.title: my heart is broken🥺

attributes.review: This app is completely stupid and Down right broken, the app wouldn’t even work and when my friends downloaded it it completely destroyed there phone, can’t believe our Commander in chief would let this happen, well he dose put baby’s in cages but he would at least be able to run his own app??? oh wait, he obviously doesn’t know what running is.
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!!

attributes.review:
This app is not good at all, I saw a flying orange on my screen how can you explain that? 
Is this a joke? I’m really disappointed! I thought this app was going to be great. But I really got scare when I saw that orange looking directly at me. 😐 furthermore it was a talkative orange, it was an ugly orange. And I think I should get therapy now because oranges are my favorite fruit but after seeing that orange—
I AM TRAUMATIZED! I’m suing you people.
attributes.title: ⚠️I love trump but this is unacceptable⚠️

attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve EVER downloaded. It took two hours to download and asked for my SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER!!!! I gave it to them. Ever since I’ve  been getting updates on the app saying “we’re watching, we’ll know if you don’t vote.” I am terrified for the my life and the lives of my 6 children. DON’T DOWNLOAD. They spread my information to foreign countries and now I think I won’t be living much longer.
attributes.title: I’m being stalked
